Top downloaded packages

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R
cran_top_downloaded.Rd

Last week.

cran_top_downloaded()

Value

Tibble of top downloaded packages.

Details

You can use the cranlogs package to get more flexibility into what is returned.

Examples

cran_top_downloaded()

#> # A tibble: 100 x 2
#>    package         count 
#>    <chr>           <chr> 
#>  1 magrittr        684219
#>  2 aws.s3          512684
#>  3 aws.ec2metadata 499408
#>  4 rsconnect       497076
#>  5 jsonlite        485517
#>  6 rlang           419313
#>  7 fs              358284
#>  8 vctrs           354651
#>  9 ggplot2         349339
#> 10 devtools        349073
#> # … with 90 more rows
